name: Remove Revision Dummy Content WP
author: Satish

sections.description:
Remove Revision and Dummy Content

Where you can scheck options

  1. Take a database bakup.

  2. Check before database size.

  3. Remove Revision and Dummy Content.

  4. Check after database size.

In order to configure settings, navigate to [ WordPress Admin -> Settings -> Remove revision history ], where you can see options:

List of Revision and post meta data

NOTE

We have this plugin compatible gutenberg.
sections.installation:
1. Upload remove-revision-dummy-content-wp folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.

  2. Activate the plugin from Admin > Plugins menu.

  3. Once activated you should check with Settings > Remove Revision Dummy Content WP

  4. Use Remove revision.
